rule.edit: Kwongerako canke uhindure ivyinjijwe mu mategeko
rule.description: Ushobora kwinjira muri iyi nzira y'ugukanda iburyo kuri paji y'urubuga iyo winjiye kuri paji y'urubuga izokwongerwako nk'itegeko Ushobora guhindura amategeko ariho arasigurwa aha hepfo. .

url.title: Uburyo bwa URL, URL yuzuye.
url.explain: Ubu buryo bushobora guhura na URL yuzuye.

glob.title: Uburyo bwa glob bukoresha ububiko bwa {{1}} Urasabwa raba ku ikoreshwa, canke ushobora kurondera ikoreshwa rya {{2}}.

example.a: {{1}}, ihuye na paji y'intango ya YouTube n'amapaji yose.

regexp.title: Invugo isanzwe, usabwe kuraba Raba ku bijanye n'ikoreshwa.
